com.scg.domain

Class Invoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scg.domain.Invoice

  • public final class Invoice
extends java.lang.Object
    Invoice encapsulates the attributes and behavior to create client invoices for a given time period from time cards. The invoicing business' name and address are obtained from a properties file. The name of the property file is specified by the PROP_FILE_NAME static member.
    Author:
    Russ Moul

    • Constructor Detail

      • Invoice

        public Invoice(ClientAccount client,
       int invoiceMonth,
       int invoiceYear)
        Construct an Invoice for a client. The time period is set from the beginning to the end of the month specified.
        Parameters:
        client - Client for this Invoice.
        invoiceMonth - Month for which this Invoice is being created. This parameter is the 0-based month number. The safest way for callers to pass a valid value is to use Calendar.MONTHNAME for the constant.
        invoiceYear - Year for which this Invoice is being created.

      • extractLineItems

        public void extractLineItems(TimeCard timeCard)
        Extract the billable hours for this Invoice's client from the input TimeCard and add them to the line items. Only those hours for the client and month unique to this invoice will be added.
        Parameters:
        timeCard - the TimeCard potentially containing line items for this Invoices client.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Create a string representation of this object, suitable for printing.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string containing this invoices client name and billing start date

      • toReportString

        public java.lang.String toReportString()
        Create a formatted string containing the printable invoice. Includes a header and footer on each page.
        Returns:
        The formatted invoice as a string.
